Fun Fact: Each of its eight arms has spines, though they use two filaments to eat.
Biggest Threat: Whales, large fishes, and sea lions
Habitat: Tropical and temperate deep waters around the globe
Predators: Whales, large fishes, and sea lions
Favorite Food: Marine snow and detritus that contains dead planktonic creatures and fecal pellets
Lifespan: 8 years of adult life, much longer total life span
Name: Vampire Squid
